all_courses.title: Learn SQL – SQL Essential Training
all_courses.author: by Dataventics
all_courses.description: After successfully completion of course, Quizes, Practical Performance you will receive a Certificate of Completion. Which will be the proof of that you have completed the courses successfully and you know the fundamentals of the courses.

body: The key features of Power BI workflow
Process of creating reports in Power BI
Learning about table, information, logical, text, iterator
Cumulative values, calculated tables, and ranking and rank over groups
Deep dive into Power BI data visualization
Creating and Altering table in SQL

body: Cultural competence and diversity in healthcare
Understanding medical prefixes, suffixes, and roots
Legal and ethical aspects of healthcare documentation

Hand hygiene and personal protective equipment

Staying current with healthcare trends and research

all_courses.title: Learn Web Development-Full Stack Essential Training
all_courses.author: by Dataventics
all_courses.description: After successfully completion of course, Quizes, Practical Performance you will receive a Certificate of Completion. Which will be the proof of that you have completed the courses successfully and you know the fundamentals of the courses.
all_courses.description2: Through our initiatives, we aim to bridge educational gaps. We are committed to making a positive impact on education globally improve learning outcomes.

body: HTML/CSS for Structuring web pages and styling.
JavaScript for Fundamentals of the language.
AJAX and Fetch API for data retrieval.
Responsive Web Design with CSS Grid and Flexbox, Media queries
Version Control with Git and GitHub.
Basics of Front-End Frameworks in React, Angular, or Vue.js.
Server-Side Programming: Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), Ruby (Ruby on Rails), or Java (Spring Boot).
Database Management: SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and/or NoSQL (MongoDB).
API Development: RESTful API design principles & GraphQL.
Authentication and Authorization: JWT (JSON Web Tokens) & OAuth
Relational Database Management System (RDBMS): Database design principles & SQL queries and optimization.
ORM (Object-Relational Mapping): Sequelize (for Node.js), SQLAlchemy (for Python), or Hibernate (for Java).
Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Containerization and Orchestration: Docker and Kubernetes.
Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Jenkins, GitLab CI, or Travis CI.
MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) or MEAN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, Node.js): Building end-to-end applications using a specific stack.
Unit Testing: Jest (for JavaScript/Node.js), pytest (for Python), JUnit (for Java).
Integration Testing: Supertest, Flask-Testing, or similar.
Web Application Security: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF), etc.
Front-End Performance: Code splitting, lazy loading, and image optimization.
Back-End Performance: Caching strategies, load balancing.
Collaboration Tools: Slack, Jira, Confluence, etc.
Agile Development: Scrum or Kanban methodologies.
Capstone Project: Apply all the learned concepts to build a full-scale web application.

all_courses.title: Learn Figma – UI/UX Design Essential Training
all_courses.author: by Dataventics
all_courses.description: After successfully completion of course, Quizes, Practical Performance you will receive a Certificate of Completion. Which will be the proof of that you have completed the courses successfully and you know the fundamentals of the courses.
all_courses.description2: Through our initiatives, we aim to bridge educational gaps. We are committed to making a positive impact on education globally improve learning outcomes.

body: Understanding the basics of user interface and user experience
Importance of good design in digital products
Historical context and evolution of UI-UX design
Creating user personas and user journeys
Overview of popular design tools (e.g., Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch)
Creating wireframes for different screen sizes
Understanding site structure and information hierarchy
Planning and organizing content for effective user engagement
Importance of color and typography in UI design
Effective use of icons in UI
Unit Testing: Jest (for JavaScript/Node.js), pytest (for Python), JUnit (for Java).
Integration Testing: Supertest, Flask-Testing, or similar.
Web Application Security: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF), etc.
Front-End Performance: Code splitting, lazy loading, and image optimization.
Back-End Performance: Caching strategies, load balancing.
Collaboration Tools: Slack, Jira, Confluence, etc.
Agile Development: Scrum or Kanban methodologies.
Capstone Project: Apply all the learned concepts to build a full-scale web application.
